attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for paedophiles and child murderers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring back the death penalty for child molesters, paedophiles and child murderers. The sentence should only be imposed when the guilt of the offender is beyond all reasonable doubt.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
